summary: Not so goaty - which is Good!
text: Wonderful product! I began to use it for my daughter who was about to turn a year old. She took it with no problems! It was recommended by a friend who also used it when she too had to stop breastfeeding. Much better for a child in my eyes. I had tried a formula sample I had received in the mail—it left a greasy film in the bottle... gross. This does not! My daughter will drink it warm or cold—so easy for on the go as well.
I got the O.N.E. Coconut Water with splash of Pineapple and it's delicious and not the least bit sweet. Just very refreshing!! LOVE IT and will continue using it.
Not what I expected. The quality was bad and shipping took forever. I won't buy again.
This item works perfectly, great price, and arrived quickly! Highly recommend.
Product arrived damaged, very disappointed. Packaging needs improvement.
Sound is crisp, bass is deep, and battery lasts long. Great for daily commute!
They sent the wrong item and took two weeks to respond. Very unprofessional.
Makes smoothies super fast. Easy to clean and compact. Totally worth the price!
Worked great for a month, then suddenly stopped. Waste of money.
Brews coffee quickly and tastes fantastic. Sleek design fits perfectly in my kitchen.
